p: Dracunculiasis. All of the world's cases of dracunculiasis occur in SSA. In 2007, only 9,585 cases were reported ( Table 2), a 99% reduction in the number of cases since most endemic countries began to report using village-based surveillance systems [36]. During 2007, Sudan (5,815) and Ghana (3,358) accounted for 96% of the total cases, with the remainder in Mali, Niger, and Nigeria ( Table 3) [36]. Mali experienced two unexpected outbreaks during this period [99].
